, the internationally recognised winner of November elections. Alassane Ouattara on Monday ordered a one-month halt to exports of cocoa and coffee, a statement said. The government of the world's top cocoa producer informs economic operators of the immediate stoppage of all exports of coffee and cocoa starting on Monday until February 23, the statement from his office said. Producers and exporters who violate the ban will be considered to be`` financing the illegitimate regime'' of Gbagbo, the statement added
